Intended Usage:
Parsing error in request (including identifiers). See 
Section 8.5.2 of [RFC7285]

A required JSON field is missing. See 
Section 8.5.2 of [RFC7285]

The type of the value of a JSON field is invalid. See 
Section 8.5.2 of [RFC7285]

The value of a JSON field is invalid. See 
Section 8.5.2 of [RFC7285]
